query: What changed for AWS A5 series filler metal references in AWS D1.1:2025 Clause 5.2.3?
expected_answer: AWS A5.36 filler metal classifications removed; updated cross-references to current A5 specifications
rationale: Clause 5.2.3 in D1.1:2025 updates filler metal references by removing obsolete AWS A5.36 classifications and updating cross-references to current A5 specifications (A5.18, A5.20, A5.28, A5.29). This ensures alignment with active filler metal standards and clarifies approved electrodes for prequalified WPS.

citations.excerpt: Filler metal requirements â€” updated A5 series references, A5.36 removed
